To find the eigenvectors of the $2×2$ matrix $T$, we solve the equation
$$$[0.8−λ0.2​0.30.7−λ​]×[xy​]​=[00​]​$$$

This leads to two linear equations in $x$ and $y$, which will yield the same values:

$$$​(M1)$$$
Therefore our first eigenvector is $p1​=[1−1​]​$ associated with $λ1​=0.5$.
$$$​A1$$$

$$$[−0.20.2​0.3−0.3​]×[xy​]​=[00​]​$$$

$$$Dn​=[0.5n0n​0n1n​]​$$$
